name: devfest-lodz-2025
description: Digital business card platform (Astro frontend + NestJS backend) â€” public, educational project demonstrating AI-assisted delivery workflow

scripts.prepare: node -e "if (process.env.CI !== 'true') { try { require('node:fs').symlinkSync('.githooks', '.git/hooks', 'dir') } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'EEXIST') throw e } }"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n astro,nest -c cyan,green "cd app/astro && pnpm run dev" "cd app/backend && pnpm run start:dev"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:astro && pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run build:postprocess
scripts.prestart: test -d dist/backend || (echo 'Error: dist/backend not found. Run pnpm run build first.' && exit 1)
scripts.pages:build: pnpm run slides:build && pnpm run build:astro:static
scripts.typecheck: cd app/astro && astro check && cd ../backend && tsc --noEmit
scripts.validate: pnpm run lint && pnpm run format && pnpm run spell
scripts.validate:fix: pnpm run lint:fix && pnpm run format:fix
